key_risks: Intense competition from other infection prevention technology providers
Overdependence on the trophon®2 system for revenue
Regulatory and compliance risks across multiple regions
Supply chain vulnerabilities and potential disruptions
Valuation concerns and potential market saturation
environmental_issues: Dependence on global supply chains with potential environmental impacts
social_issues: Progress in workforce diversity but potential for further improvement
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance risks and evolving regulatory environments
